summary: Diff implements a global Day/Night mood toggle (fixed top-left) opposite the existing global music toggle (top-right), adds a session-persisted global mood state via Zustand, applies a smooth theme crossfade and glass-panel styling changes via a global `night-mode` class, adapts the floating hearts background to day/night (dimmer/slower hearts and sparkles variations), and adds the two requested emotional text lines on Page 6 and Page 7 with animation-related classes.
